item.title: 【Off-Topic】Nvidia Super Resolution
item.description:
hey guys!

I've been testing the new feature of NVIDIA cards called "Super Resolution" and in videos that have good bit rate at 1080p and even 720p they look like a real ProRes. The main differences I notice is that it achieves a much more accurate detail than if you use Topaz. Has no problems with teeth as a topaz
This new feature analyzes the image and through the AI does an image scaling that looks impressive. Here are some screenshots so you can see the detail in how it improves. If you have such a function, I would like to know your opinions.

With Nvidia Ia


Without IA
item.author: neb010203
